meanings.definition: Lacking in refinement or good manners.
meanings.sent1: The man's loud burping at the fancy dinner was quite ungenteel.
meanings.sent2: Her unkempt appearance and rude behavior were considered ungenteel by the other guests.
meanings.sent3: It was rather ungenteel of him to slurp his soup directly from the bowl.
meanings.sent4: The graffiti on the historic building gave it an ungenteel appearance.
meanings.sent5: The ungenteel behavior of the children at the formal event shocked the attendees.

meanings.definition: Not characteristic of the upper class or aristocracy.
meanings.sent1: The simple wooden furniture was ungenteel compared to the ornate pieces in the mansion.
meanings.sent2: His plain speech and humble origins made him seem ungenteel to the snobbish society members.
meanings.sent3: Wearing sneakers to the opera was definitely an ungenteel choice.
meanings.sent4: The old car looked ungenteel next to the sleek luxury vehicles in the parking lot.
meanings.sent5: The mismatched silverware on the table gave the setting an ungenteel vibe.
